meanings.definition: A person who carries or uses a pistol.
meanings.sent1: The town sheriff warned the citizens about the dangerous pistoleros in the area.
meanings.sent2: The pistoleros gathered at the saloon before heading out on their mission.
meanings.sent3: The pistoleros tried to have a pistol duel, but they kept missing each other comically.
meanings.sent4: The pistoleros' influence in the town was like a shadow, always present but rarely seen.
meanings.sent5: The image of the pistoleros' pistols glinting in the sunlight was etched in his memory.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals armed with pistols.
meanings.sent1: The gang of pistoleros rode into town, causing a stir among the locals.
meanings.sent2: The pistoleros took cover behind the abandoned wagon, ready to defend themselves.
meanings.sent3: The pistoleros' poker game was interrupted by a loud noise, making them all jump.
meanings.sent4: The pistoleros' unity was as strong as the metal of their pistols.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the pistoleros marching in formation was both intimidating and awe-inspiring.
